reviews.review:
Dead By Daylight é um jogo de sobrevivência e terror online, onde quatro sobreviventes devem fazer geradores e abrirem uma porta para fugirem do assasino. Aqui vai o que acho do jogo:

Prós

-Gameplay bem divertida (tanto para o sobrevivente e o assasino)

-Survivors e Killers diversificados e com habilidades distintas

-O jogo tem uma lore até que legalzinha (apesar de não ser o foco do jogo)

-Jogar com amigos é bem engraçado e daora

Contras

-O balançeamento do jogo é bem mais ou menos, tem uns killers que são bem fortes

-A comunidade é meio bosta mas como não tem chat de voz é mais de boa.

É mais ou menos isso minha análise do joguinho, recomendo :)

Nota final: 8/10
สนุกมากถึงจะหาห้องนานไปหน่อย
many of you haven't seen the daylight in weeks
对萌新太不友好了！刚开始玩了15局，12局人3局屠夫，屠夫一次都杀不死个人，玩人11次都被献祭了就逃走过一次，还是tm屠夫全程挂机逃走的。。。。卸载了，，，，菜归菜，上手太难，全都是会玩的欺负萌新。。。
Всего за 2 часа игры, вас назовут кемпером, туннелером, читером, слаггером и т.д. Хотя вы просто играли по своим правилам

Alright so, at the start I didn't like the game because I didn't understand it.

I got this game to play with my friends so we mainly play survivors.
As a survivor, you can bring your A game and still get killed for a single mistake unlike killers who can make tons of mistakes and still get a 4K in the end game with their perks (especially NOED in high ranks)
Killers don't get punished whatsoever for being salty (tunneling/camping/etc) while survivors easily get punished for being salty.

If you lose while playing in full lobby with friends, the game is still enjoyable.
If you lose while playing in single queue, you are gonna get yourself depressed.

tl;dr: play as killer
Its fun  to play this game
fun to play alone or with friends theres custom and survive with friend if you want to be killer u can be. there is a rank change on the 13 every month.
喜欢就是喜欢，与理性无关

Раньше я любил эту игру. Когда нормально работал орех,когда нормально перепрыгивал через палеты и через окна.
А что теперь мы видим? Пробитие в окно,когда ты уже перелез ,пробитие в палеты,когда ты тоже перелез.
Плохо рабочий орех! Но это еще ладно,а ранги? Новичок имеющий 20 ранг попадается против 6-10,баланс?
Разработчики будто забыли о дбд и добавляют лишь кастомизацию. 
Сделайте отдельные русские сервера,чтобы тебя не пробивали в окна и палеты когда ты уже перелез и отошел от них! Что за бред?

Nice game
Really enjoyable if u like asymmetrical Horror games
But the downside is that devs don't fix common bugs and Servers
anyways overall i'd recommend this game if you're into this genre

Gra sama w sobie nie jest zła, możesz być zabójcą i ścigać pozostałych albo próbować uciec przed zabójcą wraz z 3 znajomymi. Gra ma oczywiście parę błędów ale która ich nie ma. Problemem i powodem negatywnej oceny jest społeczność tej gry. Toksyczność tego zbiorowiska jest większa niż w Czarnobylu. Mimo nieudanej gry ( 0 lub 1 zabicie ) ludzie muszą jeszcze cie zjebać robiąc ci teabag na twarz i wyzywająć na czacie jaki to łatwy ( lub twoja matka ) nie jesteś. Moim zdaniem byłoby lepiej gdyby w przypadku ciągłego kucania wprowadzić zmęczenie postaci by ta z każdym kucnięciem robiła to wolniej oraz poruszała się wolniej + wyłączenie czatu lub kary za toksyczne teksty na nim.
dui xin shou tai bu you hao le //

Gra jest bardzo zbugowana w wielu aspektach. Zaczynając od problematycznych połączeniach z grami kończąc na blokowaniu się o powietrze i dostawanie uderzenia od Zabójcy przez okno gdy taka sytuacja totalnie nie miała prawa bytu. W dodatku sporo Zabójców nie jest dobrze zbalansowanych. Noedy dzięki patrzeniu sie na ocalałego albo brak bicia serca przy kucaniu to tylko kilka z wielu przykładów. Pomimo to, gra mega wciąga i przyjemnie sie gra razem ze znajomymi

very fun game play it
ido shamen
เกมดีบัคเยอะไปหน่อย

honestly i love this game with all my heart. But the community is actually filled the the worst people who play on pc. Just about every game ends with some toxic complaint or remark on both sides of the game. On top of them both sides seem to feel some sort of entitlement for who should get the best toys. But i don't suggest this game to people if you hate dealing with unpleasant people at all and or are the type of person who takes remarks such as these to personally. on top of that if you want to play killer be weary of survive with friends groups. I don't mind this being in the game to hang out and relax with friends. however using to bully people who are actively trying to enjoy the game are lame and toxic (this has nothing to with being or bad but simply the idea of someone going out of there way to cause harm is bad). As well as the streaming and youtuber although fun to watch seem to condone this to some degree ( alot of videos and streams of these people preforming these acts on both sides doesn't seem to help). I honestly think this is the biggest problem with the game.

好玩是真的好玩，但是目前的走向越来越不对了。
谢谢你，黎明竞速。
道理很简单，人类想赢就得修机。
游戏已经出了6年了，打QTE已经不是一件难事，现版本刚入坑的萌新摸索游戏机制之后，有个车队带，两天上黄金不是问题，（而且，紫段去哪了？）
究其原因就是DBD朝着速修的道路不可控的发展了。
新的贞子完全就是个控机的屠夫，出了用来制裁速修的，但完全没有什么用，
录影带和怨气值的存在完全影响不到修机进度，官方应该也很清楚，
好像什么都无法阻止人类修机了。
（即便是古书和每日祭礼里的那些让你开裂隙之类的逛该任务。）
以前跑步不锁疲劳的时候，老版毁灭的时候，人类都可以逛街，现在把把都带开局封机，
天灾钩大踹，几分钟之后还是秒亮，骗自己呢无非是，多挂一次人无非是，
包括完美QTE从2%的进度奖励改成1%，其实一点用都没有，
毁灭改了那我就硬修呗，跑步锁疲劳那我就不逛该呗，
只要你挂上一个人，bbq绝对显示另外3个人在机子上挥洒汗水，
把地图改了，资源减少了，那我就只能修机了呗，
反倒是ui和动作改来改去，技能名称和人物建模原画越改越怪，
一直在出丑的批爆的皮肤和古书，一直在出更多的人物，
一直在买更多的版权，要是不想做游戏可以不做。
人类想出去，屠夫想四杀，每一把的结局都是最终能上段的1-2人，保段的1-2人，掉段的无非是屠夫或者另外一个人，只要你打得多大家都是红段。
完全可以放慢脚步，慢慢更新，多做平衡性，多去摸索游戏内可能的玩法，
从最初老杨的版本入坑，到现在看着这游戏一点一点的变质了，
唯一让我喜欢的一点就是有这么多恐怖角色的版权，
能看到在不同的时空中相互交错，是真的很赏心悦目的一件事，
希望能多用心，少用脚吧。
谢谢你，黎明竞速

Se você pensa em comprar este jogo para tentar ser bom, não compre pois ele por si só te impede de ser bom pois o jogo não computa seu rank pois ele é mal feito. Mas se você for comprar para dar risada ou se divertir com seus amigos pense muito bem, pois mesmo assim você vai se irritar com esse jogo pois mesmo que esteja jogando com seus amigos você vai perceber que seus amigos vão progredir e você não, isso te deixa muito desanimado com o jogo quase te fazendo parar como eu estou.

Obrigado por ler e se eu te ajudei a se decidir deixe seu like.

Jamas habia jugado un juego multijugador asimetrico diria que este fue el primero y me encanto, la mecanica del juego es sensilla de interpretar, diria que es uno de los mejores en su genero cosa mala, la comunidad, el genrush, el facecam, y un gran etc. pero bueno depende de cada uno adaptarse y para mi es algo mas casual y no tanto repentino unas partidas con amigos y listo

1~As players become more familiar with both roles, the horror dissipates and they begin to play for the competitive element alone. 
2~The poor matchmaking and the highly exploitable scoring system make Dead by Daylight less competitive than it should be, resulting in gameplay which doesn't resemble the horror experience it sets out to be.

I'm always playing this game, spending loads of money on it. But in reality, I hate this game. You should buy it. Maybe, maybe not.
The game is very fun and fast paced majority of the time. It is a lot of fun to play as both killer and survivor.
很早以前在优酷看巨色视频的时候就82块钱入手，当时没电脑只能云，自己玩才知道有多难。游戏是好游戏，抱怨也是真的要抱怨，服务器是真的不行，开了加速器玩起来才舒服点，也可能是我网不好。还有就是低段屠夫排队时间是真的久，黎明罚站。

It's a really unique and fun game. Yes it has some issues, but at the end of the day, it's one of my favorite games. There are lots of ways to play and it doesn't really get old. BHVR is consistently adding new killers, survivors, and perks to keep the game fresh and interesting.
Can't wait for VHS to come out!

Lo bueno de este juego es que te permite jugar entre 5 jugadores diferentes, siendo 4 v 1 no tarda mucho en encontrar partida es dinamico, barato y cada actualizacion que meten es para beneficio de los jugadores y del juego en si para que no sea monotono.
Very spooky much fun big killer, 10/10
